name: scc-monorepo
description: Monorepo para o Protocolo de Stablecoin SCC

scripts.deploy:contracts: cd contracts && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast --private-key 0xac0974bec39a17e36ba4a6b4d238ff944bacb478cbed5efcae784d7bf4f2ff80
scripts.setup:local: pnpm deploy:contracts && pnpm prepare:subgraph && pnpm deploy:subgraph && pnpm prepare:offchain
scripts.test:integration: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d && sleep 15 && pnpm deploy:contracts && pnpm prepare:offchain && docker compose stop keeper && docker compose rm -f keeper && docker compose up -d keeper && pnpm deploy:subgraph && pnpm --filter @scc/subgraph test:integration
